definition: distinct/clear/orderly/pain/suffering/deciduous bush used in Chinese medicine (genus Vitex)/punishment cane (old)
surname Chu/abbr. for Hubei 湖北省[Hu2 bei3 Sheng3] and Hunan 湖南省[Hu2 nan2 Sheng3] provinces together/Chinese kingdom during the Spring and Autumn and Warring States Periods (722-221 BC)

sentences.english: The breeze swayed a few dry weeds on the crest of the wall, and they gave out a faint, sweet, melancholy sound.
sentences.chinese: 牆頭上幾根枯草在風中發出稍微悽楚的聲音。

sentences.english: She looks wan, sallow and miserable, she's probably had some bad luck.
sentences.chinese: 她面容憔悴，目光悽楚，大概是遇到了不幸的事。

sentences.english: She smiled drearily, looking down upon her bosom.
sentences.chinese: 她悽楚地笑了笑，垂下眼睛看着自己胸前。
